name: More...
Range of x hits to kill::2: Range of x hits to kill
Multipliers::Head: Multipliers

Movement:Standard:Speed: Assault Rifles have medium penetration, except the Sheiva and MX Garand, which have high penetration
The XR-2 kicks 2.5% less on the first two shots
The M8A7 kicks 30% less on the first two shots
SMGs have medium penetration, except the Vesper, which has low penetration
The BRM and Dingo have medium penetration
The Gorgon and 48 Dredge have high penetration
The Locus and SVG-100 have increased upper arm, lower arm and hand multipliers of 2
The P-06 has increased upper arm multipliers of 1.5
The SVG-100 has increased upper leg multipliers of 1.5
The KRM-262 with Fast Mag reloads two shells at a time
Switching to a Handgun uses quick drop and quick raise
The RK5 without Dual Wield fires the first two rounds in a burst at the same time
Launchers have an explosion radius instead of a range
Switching to the Fists or Combat Knife uses quick drop and quick raise
The Scythe has medium penetration and a spin-up time of 0.35
